thread.section_title: National News -  New York Daily News
thread.title: Police respond to reports of shots fired at Houston hospital
thread.title_full: Police respond to reports of shots fired at Houston hospital

author: CHRISTOPHER BRENNAN
title: Police respond to reports of shots fired at Houston hospital
text:
Police respond to reports of shots fired at Houston hospital Police respond to reports of shots fired at Houston hospital   3:23 PM 
Police are responding to reports of shots fired at a Houston hospital. 
Shots were reported at Ben Taub Hospital around 2 p.m. Tuesday afternoon, leading Houston police to send a SWAT team to the scene. 
Unidentified sources told KPRC that the facility had been locked down and aerial footage from KHOU showed some patients on hospital beds being wheeled out of the building. Shots were reported at Ben Taub Hospital in Houston Tuesday afternoon. Above, patients gathered outside. (KHOU) 
This is a developing story and will be updated Tags:
